CodeGen.SQLStatement: Select Distinct usr_accounts.USR_AccountID, cmn_per_personinfo.FirstName, cmn_per_personinfo.LastName, cmn_per_personinfo.PrimaryEmail, ProfileImage.File_ServerLocation From cmn_per_personinfo_2_account Inner Join cmn_per_personinfo On cmn_per_personinfo_2_account.CMN_PER_PersonInfo_RefID = cmn_per_personinfo.CMN_PER_PersonInfoID Left Join (Select doc_documentrevisions.Document_RefID, doc_documentrevisions.File_ServerLocation From doc_documentrevisions Where doc_documentrevisions.IsLastRevision = 1 And doc_documentrevisions.IsDeleted = 0 And doc_documentrevisions.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID) ProfileImage On cmn_per_personinfo.ProfileImage_Document_RefID = ProfileImage.Document_RefID Inner Join usr_accounts On cmn_per_personinfo_2_account.USR_Account_RefID = usr_accounts.USR_AccountID Where usr_accounts.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And usr_accounts.IsDeleted = '0' And cmn_per_personinfo_2_account.IsDeleted = '0' And cmn_per_personinfo.IsDeleted = '0'
